violent_crime_rate_new_added_to_fill_mec.name: Violent Crime Rate [NEW - Added to fill mechanism gap]
violent_crime_rate_new_added_to_fill_mec.domain: Criminal Justice, Social Environment, Public Safety
violent_crime_rate_new_added_to_fill_mec.unit: Violent crimes per 100,000 population per year

voter_turnout_rate.name: Voter Turnout Rate
voter_turnout_rate.unit: Percent of eligible population voting in general elections

wage_stagnation_rate.name: Wage Stagnation Rate
wage_stagnation_rate.unit: Percent change in real median wage over 10 years

water_insecurity_quality_violations.name: Water Insecurity / Quality Violations
water_insecurity_quality_violations.unit: Percent of population served by systems with health-based violations

workers_compensation_benefit_adequacy.name: Workers' Compensation Benefit Adequacy
workers_compensation_benefit_adequacy.unit: Average weekly benefit as % of state average wage

workers_compensation_coverage_rate.name: Workers' Compensation Coverage Rate
workers_compensation_coverage_rate.unit: Percent of workforce covered by workers' comp insurance

workplace_injury_and_illness_rate.name: Workplace Injury and Illness Rate
workplace_injury_and_illness_rate.type: Structural Condition (could be Individual, but aggregate rate is structural)
workplace_injury_and_illness_rate.unit: Cases per 100 full-time equivalent (FTE) workers per year

hiv_status_diagnosed.name: HIV Status (Diagnosed)
hiv_status_diagnosed.unit: Rate per 100k living with diagnosed HIV

integrated_behavioral_health_visits.name: Integrated Behavioral Health Visits
integrated_behavioral_health_visits.unit: % primary care visits with BH integration

property_crime_rate_new_added_for_comple.name: Property Crime Rate [NEW - Added for completeness]
property_crime_rate_new_added_for_comple.domain: Criminal Justice, Social Environment, Economic Security
property_crime_rate_new_added_for_comple.unit: Property crimes per 100,000 population per year

state_rainy_day_fund_balance.name: State Rainy Day Fund Balance
state_rainy_day_fund_balance.unit: Rainy day fund balance as % of state general fund expenditures

substance_use_harm_reduction_service_acc.name: Substance Use Harm Reduction Service Access

digital_literacy_barrier_critical.name: Digital Literacy Barrier (Critical)
digital_literacy_barrier_critical.unit: % unable to complete essential online tasks

drought_severity.name: Drought Severity
drought_severity.unit: Percent of time in moderate/severe drought (5-year average)

labor_force_participation_rate.name: Labor Force Participation Rate
labor_force_participation_rate.unit: Percent of working-age population (16+) in labor force

single_family_zoning_restriction_prevale.name: Single-Family Zoning Restriction Prevalence
single_family_zoning_restriction_prevale.unit: Percent of residentially zoned land restricted to single-family

sugar_sweetened_beverage_ssb_consumption.name: Sugar-Sweetened Beverage (SSB) Consumption [RETAINED - Policy-Relevant]
sugar_sweetened_beverage_ssb_consumption.unit: Servings per day OR % consuming ≥1 serving/day

pedestrian_and_cyclist_safety_fatality_r.name: Pedestrian and Cyclist Safety (Fatality Rate)
pedestrian_and_cyclist_safety_fatality_r.unit: Pedestrian + cyclist fatalities per 100,000 population per year
